de.bitbrain.braingdx.assets

Class SmartAssetLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bitbrain.braingdx.assets.SmartAssetLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameAssetLoader

    public class SmartAssetLoader
extends Object
implements GameAssetLoader
    Loads assets defined by an interface. The default strategy looks as follows:

    • Textures
    • Sounds
    • Musics
    • Fonts
    • Particles
    • TiledMaps
    In order to extend or change the list make use of the SmartAssetLoader.SmartAssetLoaderConfiguration.
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez
